entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight then snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 4:28 PM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 late in the morning. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:28 PM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 27 in the evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:28 PM CST Thursday 26 January 2023
